name: Metro Amazing Taxi
description:
Metro Amazing Taxi!!!
Drive around city finding out passengers, collection money and operate your terribly own taxi cab company by shopping for additional yellow cab during this newest driving machine game on the store.
Features:
• Great animations, and live conversation.
• FM radio available to you as taxi driver to keep the passengers happy.
• Realistic Airport Environment of flights landing and takeoff, if you are a keen airport taxi games.
• One of the best cab game of all the taxi games on the store.
• Extremely smooth controls.
